item.title: Infominer's GitHub Portfolio and HowTo
item.description: Now there is a simple way to create a GitHub style portfolio for your github repositories!

item.title: Open Source Publishing
item.description: I’ll be regularly posting updates from analytics and Google search console, to share how it isn’t so impossible to rise through the rankings if you create useful content.

item.title: Indieweb Github Repositories
item.description: A start at exploring Indieweb Topics

item.title: Indieweb Resources
item.description: When you post something on the web, it should belong to you, not a corporation. Too many companies have gone out of business and lost all of their users’ data. By joining the IndieWeb, your content stays yours and in your control.

item.title: GitHub Pages-Starter Pack
item.description: Github makes it easy to get started, with the click of a button, you can have a web-page live, requiring only markdown skills (that anyone can learn on the go). Each feature you want to enable requires a little more learning, and GitHub Pages is set up so that if you decide to, you can gradually progress from content creator to web-developer.

item.title: GitHub Pages-Extended Resources
item.description: All those extra things you’ll need to know.
